projects.title: Origami
projects.description:
Application to sell handmade origami figures. It contains everything
    that is needed: a CMS (built from scratch) where admins can manipulate
    the data presented on the front end; a full authentification and
    authorization (roles/permissions); cart system and stripe payment. Its
    also an improved variant of the "Shop" project.

projects.title: MCFree
projects.description:
Website was created for a minecraft community server for handling
    content, updates, bugs and more.. Also containing a shop section using
    cart functionality and a CMS built from scratch where admins can
    manage everything on the website.

projects.title: Shop
projects.description:
This is a project where users can navigate through it choosing clothes
    then buying them through STRIPE payment method. It also contains a
    CMS, Cart System, Review and Rating System built from scratch. If you
    want to know more check the source code below or the yt video.

projects.title: Novel Heaven
projects.description:
Website where the administrator can upload books/novels (and any other
    kind of article) chapters. The administrator can manage all the
    content (including user management) from inside the private CMS built
    from scratch. The app contains the authentification & authorization
    with roles & permissions.

projects.title: JSON Manipulation
projects.description: A simple project that manipulates (filter/sort/search/paginate) data from an external API.

projects.title: Musica
projects.description:
Website represents a record label that registers an album with it's
    artists, groups, songs and more. Also the app can display all data for
    the user to search through and check for albums. Contains a private CMS built from scratch for
    admins.

projects.title: Health Tracker
projects.description:
Website that tracks your health by measuring your BMI (including a complete auth. implementation
    i.e.
    register, login, password forgot, reset) and also calculates the water intake based on your BMI.

projects.title: Search Engine
projects.description:
A search-engine website that crawls data from a given link (i.e. wiki), store those links in the
    database, then display and redirect to the original links. Works as google images too.

projects.title: Currency Grabber
projects.description: A simple currency grabber that takes data from a bank API and displays it into a table where it can also be saved inside a database by pressing a button.
